summary: In this conversation, the customer was having trouble with their billing as they were expecting a certain speed from their internet service but weren't receiving it. After looking into the issue, the agent determined that the customer was currently receiving speeds within the expected range of the standard internet service. The agent then offered an upgrade to the high-speed internet service which provides speeds of up to 25 Mbps download and 5 Mbps upload. The customer agreed to upgrade and the plan was upgraded accordingly.
